title: Infanta
description: Her name is Indigo, color of mourning—and her home is the wide world, for she has no other. She cannot die, she cannot age—for until she lifts the curse of the Tower of Regrets, she is doomed to immortality. She has one friend, who is not human. And she has one enemy, who will haunt her footsteps until the end of time...
author: Louise Cooper
